# Installation of Packages

To install packages needed to run and compile this book you can use the
installation script provided.

```{r, eval=FALSE}

source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lshep/RPC519RBioc/refs/heads/main/installationScript.R")
```

This will install optional packages utilized in the appendix and to compile this
book. To choose what packages to install you may reference this
[script](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lshep/RPC519RBioc/refs/heads/main/installationScript.R)
and optionally select installs.
